author: psmith
msg: allowed the ChainsawAppenderHandler to have a QueueInterval property
and hooked this value up to the View menu's new Responsive
slider, so a user can adjust how frequently things get posted to the GUI.
This is pretty useful when you have events screeeeeaming in, stops
the GUI from becoming molten lead.  Would like to eventually add this to
a CTRL-RIGHT click popup menu maybe later.

author: sdeboy
msg: Removed wait/notify event processing and replaced with 1 sec polling thread.

author: sdeboy
msg: Fixed potential NPE problem in throwableinfo and removed regexp lookup in factory

author: ceki
msg: Modifed the newly added LoggingEvent constructor and adapted dependent classes to reflect the change.
